### shouldBeDeferred() {#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldBeDeferred (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp; CalleeTTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC, int &amp; TotalSecondaryCost, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB)&gt; GetInlineCost)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return true if inlining of CB can block the caller from being inlined which is proved to be more beneficial.

<code>IC</code> is the estimated inline cost associated with callsite <code>CB</code>. <code>TotalSecondaryCost</code> will be set to the estimated cost of inlining the caller if <code>CB</code> is suppressed for inlining.

Definition at line <a href="#l00249">249</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineadvisor-cpp">InlineAdvisor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// replay will need augmentations to interleave with them correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ReplaySettings.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replayinlinersettings/#ae20ba157a115788500db5b3553e244cb">ReplayFile</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Advisor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a903adbd42316e51df3cda640d664aa65">llvm::getReplayInlineAdvisor</a>(M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>, M.getContext(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             std::move(Advisor), ReplaySettings,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; EmitRemarks =&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, IC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239c4ac35d6028bfacaed4018d0488faab8e7b465df7c5979dc731d06e84ce2cf">InliningAdvisorMode::Release</a>:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return true if inlining of CB can block the caller from being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inlined which is proved to be more beneficial. \\p IC is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// estimated inline cost associated with callsite \\p CB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p TotalSecondaryCost will be set to the estimated cost of inlining the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// caller if \\p CB is suppressed for inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249" lineLink="#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc">shouldBeDeferred</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;CalleeTTI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;TotalSecondaryCost,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB)&gt; GetInlineCost) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now we only handle local or inline functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Caller-&gt;hasLocalLinkage() &amp;&amp; !Caller-&gt;hasLinkOnceODRLinkage())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the cost of inlining CB is non-positive, it is not going to prevent the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller from being inlined into its callers and hence we don&#39;t need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &lt;= 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to detect the case where the current inlining candidate caller (call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it B) is a static or linkonce-ODR function and is an inlining candidate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elsewhere, and the current candidate callee (call it C) is large enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that inlining it into B would make B too big to inline later. In these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// circumstances it may be best not to inline C into B, but to inline B into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its callers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This only applies to static and linkonce-ODR functions because those are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expected to be available for inlining in the translation units where they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are used. Thus we will always have the opportunity to make local inlining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decisions. Importantly the linkonce-ODR linkage covers inline functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and templates in C++.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: All of this logic should be sunk into getInlineCost. It relies on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the internal implementation of the inline cost metrics rather than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// treating them as truly abstract units etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalSecondaryCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The candidate cost to be imposed upon the current function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CandidateCost = IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the caller has local linkage and can be inlined to all its callers, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can apply a huge negative bonus to TotalSecondaryCost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ApplyLastCallBonus = Caller-&gt;hasLocalLinkage() &amp;&amp; !Caller-&gt;hasOneUse();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This bool tracks what happens if we DO inline C into B.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumCallerUsers = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : Caller-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CS2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this isn&#39;t a call to Caller (it could be some other sort</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of reference) skip it.  Such references will prevent the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from being removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CS2 || CS2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#a2b1ae7cf1bafdd43d1fee4c6ad0a2913">getCalledFunction</a>() != Caller) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ApplyLastCallBonus = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC2 = GetInlineCost(&#42;CS2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumCallerCallersAnalyzed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IC2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ApplyLastCallBonus = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#ad166c05849a74acb5e56415f7533e8ad">isAlways</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if inlining of the original callsite would erase the cost delta of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this callsite. We subtract off the penalty for the call instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which we would be deleting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#ad1798a4114dad2820cb163dc5b2db758">getCostDelta</a>() &lt;= CandidateCost) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalSecondaryCost += IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumCallerUsers++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all outer calls to Caller would get inlined, the cost for the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one is set very low by getInlineCost, in anticipation that Caller will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be removed entirely.  We did not account for this above unless there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is only one caller of Caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ApplyLastCallBonus)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalSecondaryCost -= CalleeTTI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a751d7804543eb7033df99f99d5aa1dc1">getInliningLastCallToStaticBonus</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If InlineDeferralScale is negative, then ignore the cost of primary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inlining -- IC.getCost() multiplied by the number of callers to Caller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a1277166bb83134f665a44bedcb4a38f9">InlineDeferralScale</a> &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalSecondaryCost &lt; IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalCost = TotalSecondaryCost + IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &#42; NumCallerUsers;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Allowance = IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &#42; <a href="#a1277166bb83134f665a44bedcb4a38f9">InlineDeferralScale</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalCost &lt; Allowance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">llvm &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a80c2c1a9a2f2eec5c7f3bd5485012802"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab89f1db02887aa569176f0e29622eb47">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;R, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a> &amp;Arg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R &lt;&lt; Arg.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/diagnosticinfooptimizationbase/argument/#a71dcf73afcc3e377656e9503a261c42f">Val</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
